评论详情: I like the fabric and how it fits but it is not short girl friendly. It was very long for me
So soft and comfortable. Cute lounge wear appropriate for running errands or relaxing at home. I already bought 2 more colors

I’m 5’10 and 230 lbs the XL fits almost perfectly! The pants are long, even with my hight I still have and extra inch in bare feet so perfect with sneakers. The only thing is I would have preferred an extra inch in the shirt, it’s definitely cropped.
I am 5’6 weighing 160lbs and I ordered the XL for additional comfort. It fit me well and is soft to the touch. I would order more outfits and happy with the purchase.

Very nice quality and hugs my curves beautifully. Provides a good fit and is very stretchy limits no day to day movement. A but see through but nothing too extreme. Would definitely recommend as perfect loungewear
The material is soft and stretchy and the outfit fits nicely.
These are cute but way too thin. Can see all of my undergarment lines. The shirt is a little long too.

Oh I will be getting another set in this same color and a different color. For reference, I’m 5’2” and it’s not too long. The material is kind of thin but not see through. And fits me so good! It’s also very stretchy and comfortable.

*HONEST REVIEW * I read some of the reviews on this set and took a chance and bought it.. 1. It's TALL GIRL FRIENDLY...I'm '5-8" and 210 lbs and as you can see, the pants hits the floor...Great 2. The set is a little sheer/thin...I would recommend a black or skin tone under garment when wearing 3. It's just comfy and soft. The material is stretchy and warm...Just very comfy..The color is a true pink....Baby girl pink color. If I had to do errands I would wear a long jacket or flowing sweater to cover up the sheer parts...It's not a deal breaker for me...I will keep it and probably get another color...I just so happened to like it alot... And YES the waist is a little narrow...but if you wear a nice snatching undergarment you'll be fine if you have a little/lot of belly...I was fine with it...I dont...But don't let that stop you from buying this set...It's nice. Did I mention it does hug your curves...Hubby approved!! I recommend this set....GET IT !
Great fit .. Bought 2 more.  Much better than skims.

By far the comfiest 2 piece set I’ve ever tried! It’s seriously perfect for running errands or a casual but cute outing. The comfort is amazing and it’s nice and stretchy and shows off the curves just right. I felt so good in this set!
Great material, super comfy. I’m also 5’7 and it was long on me so definitely works for the tall girls! Ordering 2 more!
Very comfortable lounge wear. Stretchy cotton like feel. Perfect airport outfit, or just doing daily duties.
